Midwife-led unit
Midwife-led units are 
staffed	by	midwives	and	are	
particularly recommended for 
women with a straightforward 
pregnancy, because the rate 
of intervention is lower and 
the outcome for the baby is 
no	different	compared	with	an	
obstetric unit. More details are 
available from your midwife.. 
Your care in labour will be 
provided by midwives and 
if a problem arises you will 
be transferred to the lo
